name: Reaper's Interin Program (R.I.P.)
description:
Welcome! You are dead.


When you are neither good enough for heaven nor bad enough for hell, then you are destined for an eternity in limbo...



You can spend the rest of your unlife in bureaucratic madness or you can have a purposeful afterlife.
Join the reaper academy, get trained to be a reaper and help the system.

Join Now!

In our course you will learn to capture the souls of the recently dead,



You will train the necessary skills



regardless of the difficulties.



The obstacles



The laser rays




Upgrade the 50 levels to graduate and get your reaper's diploma.



Work for the system.
